Message:
I still don’t understand
why Granny looked so sad...

but I felt the sheer amount
of love in her words.

So, I’ll stop agonizing
over my fate as a witch...

At least, that’s
what I thought I’d do...

One day, a disease spread
throughout the village.

a traveler who bought flowers
from me some time ago
mentioned something similar.

They said a neighboring village
was hit by some disease.

That was the most thought
I gave it at the time.

But, the villagers seemed
to be acting differently.

They were in an uproar,
calling the disease a curse,

and blaming its spread
on a witch—on me.

“Those wretched flowers
you sell are cursed...
You used them to spread
this disease!”
